rules_text:
Flying
[i]Manipulate light[/i] – When Sunny Milk enters, up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“There are times when you get lost even on roads that are not very long... When this happens, eight or nine times out of ten, you would be right to think this is the work of a fairy.”
—Hieda no Akyuu, The Gensokyo Chronicle[/i]
